rukus.text: Yallay addunyaa kee akeerâ reeda gabat le nabaah kay kayri kay ginoh amol yemeggeh, kaadu usuk ummaanimil qamal geyto li kinni
Usuk rabaa kee manó gine rabbi kinni sinaamey sin yaqiyyiruh, taamâ maqaanéh siinik yayse num yamixxiguh, kaadu usuk mayso li tu kaak mataysaay, dambi cabti li kinni, kaal yuduure marah

Usuk Yallay malcina qaran sittak amol inkigide akkuk gine kinni. wagta numow Yallih ginót hebelto fulaa kee sissinaané matablak, tokkel qaraanâ fanah wagitto gacam gacisey, usuk tama nabna luk baquu kee qanxixu kaat maay tablee
Tohuk lakal Kaadu wagitto qaraanâ fanah namma adda gacam gacisey, wagta numow kunti qunxaane luk bura luk kol aduurelek, Yallih ginot hebelto cooca able kalah, is wagittok taqabba itteh
Yalli nummah, xiibitak addunyâ qaran ifta cutuukat bilisneeh, sheytoonâ geedano tet abne, kaadu akeeral girâ digaalá keenih massosne axcuk
Kaadu isi Rabbil koroosite mari jahannam digaalá le, kaadu is manxu uma gacsimeynaay
Usun teetit qambisiman waqdi, teetiy faciyyi gibdah muxxak kaxxa xongoló yaabben

Jahannam korosuh abte naqbih gibdah taggiggiriqqeem xayossu hayte, sinaamak horta tet addal qambisiminnaan waqdi tet loynissa malayka addunyal ta digaalak sin meesiisa farmoyti siinih mamattoo axcuk ken esserta
Yeey, nummah meesiise nel yemeeteh iyyan, tokkel kaa dirabbosneeh, Yalli hebeltoh iimiy oobise mali inne, isin tu hinniton kaxxa fingqat yan mara akke wayteenik
Kaadu usun woh aalamuk: nummah nanu nek iyyaanam cakki maabbah aabbinninoy, hinnay tu raaqisa kas le mara akkķinninoy, urta giráh mara akkuk manannino iyyen
Tokkel usun sinni dambi (koroosannu kinnuk) yeelemeeniih, tokkel urta girah marah finqaa kee Yallih Racmatak yaxxeereenim tanay
Diggah, ablekal sinni Rabbik meesita mari, dambi cabtii kee kaxxa galató le
Sinni maxcó qellissoonu, hinnay taybulloonu, Yalli sin alilwat tanim yaaxigi kinni
Gino gineh yan Rabbi mannal aaxige waa qellissaanam kee taybulleenim? Usuk xuwawli, adda yaaxigi kinnik
